channel.title: Acknowledgements and Contributions on HOT Toolbox
channel.description: Recent content in Acknowledgements and Contributions on HOT Toolbox

item.title: Credits
item.description: This guide has been developed as part of the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Project, funded by The World Bank’s Global Facility for Disaster Reduction and Recovery (GFDRR). The toolbox builds upon previous HOT projects including the Open Mapping for SDGs Guide and the Refugee Mapping Toolkit. Launch Version 1.0 Initial Release Date: December 2019 Project leads Jess Beutler, Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team - Project Manager; Content generation and management Russ Biggs, Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team - Technical Project Manager; Site development Content Support from:
